00026 void VectorRequestHandler::handle_request_reliable(boost::shared_ptr<WorldInformation> world_information,
00027                                                     boost::shared_ptr<const Request> request) {
00028      boost::shared_ptr<const VectorRequest> vector_request =
00029              boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<const VectorRequest> (request);
00030      if(!vector_request) {
00031          throw std::invalid_argument("Not a vector request.");
00032      }
00033     const boost::shared_ptr<RobotIdentifier> & robot_id = vector_request->robot().id();
00034     RobotData & robot_data = world_information->get_according_robot_data(robot_id);
00035     const Vector3d & requested_local_vector(vector_request->requested_vector());
00036     boost::shared_ptr<Vector3d> requested_global_vector;
00037     // TODO(craupach) this is a problem: For velocity and acceleration we should set the origin to
00038     // (0,0,0)
00039     if(robot_data.coordinate_system_axis().get<0>()){
00040         requested_global_vector.reset(new Vector3d(*CoordConverter::local_to_global(requested_local_vector, robot_data.position(), robot_data.coordinate_system_axis())));
00041     }else{
00042         requested_global_vector.reset(new Vector3d(requested_local_vector));
00043     }
00044 
00045     // TODO(craupach) apply pipeline here
00046 
00047     apply_request(vector_request, robot_data, requested_global_vector);
00048 }
00049 
00050 void VectorRequestHandler::apply_request(boost::shared_ptr<const VectorRequest> vector_request, RobotData & robot_data, boost::shared_ptr<Vector3d> processed_global_vector)
00051 {
00052     if(boost::shared_ptr<const PositionRequest> position_request = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<const PositionRequest>(vector_request)){
00053 
00054         robot_data.set_position(processed_global_vector);
00055     }else if(boost::shared_ptr<const VelocityRequest> velocity_request = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<const VelocityRequest>(vector_request)){
00056 
00057         robot_data.set_velocity(processed_global_vector);
00058     } else if(boost::shared_ptr<const AccelerationRequest> acceleration_request = boost::dynamic_pointer_cast<const AccelerationRequest>(vector_request)){
00059 
00060         robot_data.set_acceleration(processed_global_vector);
00061     }
00062 }
